markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Recollect Studies](/Feats.aspx?ID=2259) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 52</row>

**Archetype** [Swordmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=33)

**Prerequisites**
[Swordmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1139); expert in a skill used to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26)

**Requirements**
You're fighting a creature of your level or lower that could be identified by [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) with a skill in which you're an expert.

</column>

---

You paid attention during your studies and remember the right way to attack various creatures. Choose a creature that meets the requirements. You learn the resistances, immunities, or weaknesses of the creature (your choice) without needing to successfully Recall Knowledge.
name: Recollect Studies
prerequisite: Swordmaster Dedication; expert in a skill used to Recall Knowledge
prerequisite_markdown: [Swordmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1139); expert in a skill used to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26)
